# ğ‘­ğ˜°ğ”«ğ˜ğ“¼ Galore
This package allows you to replace any old text with a fancified version using fonts!

## Installation
Install this package using
```sh
espanso install fonts
```

## Usage
This package replaces text found with colons with the same text, but fancified using the specified font.
